stories.text:
disclaimer, the first page may take a few seconds to load

https://twitter.com/zeminary/status/1493867456221401089

http://zeminary.com/?f=grams.zm

http://zeminary.com/?f=ideam.zm

http://zeminary.com/?f=glogs.zm

tl;dr

if you organize binary numbers of even digit lengths into a hierarchy (according to specific rules of unfolding), you end up with something that looks & selfrelates like the blocktime universe, (or less ambitiously, like the tracy widom distribution)

by looks i mean — you can see, in broad strokes, (a) being & nothing, (1) inflation, (2) big bang, (2abcd) the event horizon & cauchy horizon & singularity, (3) expansion, then entropy in three parts, (4) where dark matter is stronger than dark energy, (5) where dark matter is roughly equal to dark energy, (6) where dark matter is weaker than dark energy, (b) heat death

by relates — you can see their relativeish & absoluteish beginnings & ends — where they're coming from & where they're going to

& fascinatingly, the more digits, the more the resolution of phenomena — ex length 4 has no blackholes, length 6 has blackholes, and length 8 has blackholes with hawkings radiation & er = epr, etc

...

altogether, artists take their inspiration from nature math etc & this looks to me like what may have inspired the creator to have made the universe the way it is

...

three analogies that might help you to understand what I'm seeing here

infinite periodic table hierarchy of physics phenomena

pnp spotcheck for processual & physics theories

the serial tone row & ursatz of the universe —

— music is a dimensional reduction of being

...

one important disclaimer

theres no equations, only preschool math & ravensmatriceslike thinking but with force projection

by force projection i mean — the numbers are positions & the relations between the numbers are relations, but you have to inject your own forces & momentums to figure out how to get from one number to another — fortunately we've got the standard model

...

one application of this

we used to think that the big bang came first, then inflation, but now we know that's not true

but what if we had this structure, we could've saved decades of theorizing & checked the answer

similarly, we used to think that blackholes were inescapable, but now we know that they aren't

but what if we had looked at this structure & its relations at digit length 8 & ... etc

...

one fantastic thought

just as physics informed math & now math physics, so too will music inform physics & physics music

...

how did this come about

i wanted to write one really good poem & decided to set it to binary numbers

then i wanted to figure out how to relate my words to these numbers musically
stories.title: i found a math structure that looks and relates like the blocktime universe
